title.rendered: Knack Launches Spring Backpack Collection in Trending Teal Green and Lilac Haze

content.rendered:
This Season's Colors Make Knack's Work and Travel Backpacks the Must-Have Accessory for Fashion-Forward Professionals


Knack Teal Green and Lilac Haze Expandable Laptop Backpacks for Women
Two Women Carrying Teal Green and Lilac Haze Color Expandable Laptop Backpacks for Women

PROVIDENCE, R.I., April 4, 2023 (Newswire.com) - Today, Knack Inc., the innovative professional accessories company known for its versatile, stylish and functional designs, announced the drop of two new spring fashion colors, Teal Green and Lilac Haze, in its popular Series 2 backpack collection. 

The new Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are inspired by the latest spring color trends, consumer-tested, and perfect for those who want to stay fashionable while on the go. The Series 2 backpack collection is designed for modern professionals who need a versatile everyday backpack that can take them from work to travel, and everywhere in between, without needing to stop and repack.

"At Knack, we are always striving to bring our customers the latest in style and functionality, and our new Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are no exception," said Chad Mellen, founder and CEO of Knack. "We're excited to introduce these new colors in our Series 2 Collection, which is already a favorite among Knackpackers."

The Teal Green color is a cool and calming shade that evokes a sense of tranquility while the Lilac Haze color is a soft and romantic shade that adds a touch of elegance to both work and casual outfits. Both colors are versatile and can be paired with a variety of attire, making them the perfect choice for any professional who wants to look stylish and put-together.

To create the new colors, Knack selected a number of potential color options for spring and narrowed down to these two after interviews and surveys with over 300 current and potential Knack owners.

The Series 2 backpack collection is designed with the modern professional in mind and features Knack's best-in-class organization for everyday carry combined with its unique, patent-pending, hidden expandable suitcase compartment for up to three days of travel. 

The new Series 2 Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are now available exclusively on Knack's website www.knackbags.com for $265.

About Knack Inc.:

Launched by a seasoned team from Tumi, Coach and eBags, Knack is a privately held, direct-to-consumer company offering patent-pending, expandable backpacks and accessories that easily take modern professionals from work to travel and back again with just one bag. With a focus on versatility, style, and function, Knack's One Bag Life mission provides the ability to do less carrying and more experiencing every day. For more about Knack, and to experience One Bag Life, visit www.knackbags.com.

Contact Information:
Jamie Orr
Content Director
jamie@knackbags.com
401-404-4003
Related Files
FrontLilacHaze.jpg
Teal Green Front.jpg



Original Source: Knack Launches Spring Backpack Collection in Trending Teal Green and Lilac Haze

excerpt.rendered:
This Season’s Colors Make Knack’s Work and Travel Backpacks the Must-Have Accessory for Fashion-Forward Professionals


Knack Teal Green and Lilac Haze Expandable Laptop Backpacks for Women
Two Women Carrying Teal Green and Lilac Haze Color Expandable Laptop Backpacks for Women


PROVIDENCE, R.I., April 4, 2023 (Newswire.com)
–
Today, Knack Inc., the innovative professional accessories company known for its versatile, stylish and functional designs, announced the drop of two new spring fashion colors, Teal Green and Lilac Haze, in its popular Series 2 backpack collection. 

The new Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are inspired by the latest spring color trends, consumer-tested, and perfect for those who want to stay fashionable while on the go. The Series 2 backpack collection is designed for modern professionals who need a versatile everyday backpack that can take them from work to travel, and everywhere in between, without needing to stop and repack.

“At Knack, we are always striving to bring our customers the latest in style and functionality, and our new Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are no exception,” said Chad Mellen, founder and CEO of Knack. “We’re excited to introduce these new colors in our Series 2 Collection, which is already a favorite among Knackpackers.”

The Teal Green color is a cool and calming shade that evokes a sense of tranquility while the Lilac Haze color is a soft and romantic shade that adds a touch of elegance to both work and casual outfits. Both colors are versatile and can be paired with a variety of attire, making them the perfect choice for any professional who wants to look stylish and put-together.

To create the new colors, Knack selected a number of potential color options for spring and narrowed down to these two after interviews and surveys with over 300 current and potential Knack owners.

The Series 2 backpack collection is designed with the modern professional in mind and features Knack’s best-in-class organization for everyday carry combined with its unique, patent-pending, hidden expandable suitcase compartment for up to three days of travel. 

The new Series 2 Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are now available exclusively on Knack’s website www.knackbags.com for $265.

About Knack Inc.:

Launched by a seasoned team from Tumi, Coach and eBags, Knack is a privately held, direct-to-consumer company offering patent-pending, expandable backpacks and accessories that easily take modern professionals from work to travel and back again with just one bag. With a focus on versatility, style, and function, Knack’s One Bag Life mission provides the ability to do less carrying and more experiencing every day. For more about Knack, and to experience One Bag Life, visit www.knackbags.com.

Contact Information:

Jamie Orr

jamie@knackbags.com

401-404-4003

Contact Information: Jamie Orr Content Director jamie@knackbags.com 401-404-4003 Related Files FrontLilacHaze.jpg Teal Green Front.jpg Original Source: Knack Launches Spring Backpack Collection in Trending Teal Green and Lilac Haze
aioseo_head_json.twitter:title: Knack Launches Spring Backpack Collection in Trending Teal Green and Lilac Haze - Beauty Ring Magazine
aioseo_head_json.twitter:description: This Season's Colors Make Knack's Work and Travel Backpacks the Must-Have Accessory for Fashion-Forward Professionals Knack Teal Green and Lilac Haze Expandable Laptop Backpacks for Women Two Women Carrying Teal Green and Lilac Haze Color Expandable Laptop Backpacks for Women PROVIDENCE, R.I., April 4, 2023 (Newswire.com) - Today, Knack Inc., the innovative professional accessories company known for its versatile, stylish and functional designs, announced the drop of two new spring fashion colors, Teal Green and Lilac Haze, in its popular Series 2 backpack collection. The new Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are inspired by the latest spring color trends, consumer-tested, and perfect for those who want to stay fashionable while on the go. The Series 2 backpack collection is designed for modern professionals who need a versatile everyday backpack that can take them from work to travel, and everywhere in between, without needing to stop and repack. "At Knack, we are always striving to bring our customers the latest in style and functionality, and our new Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are no exception," said Chad Mellen, founder and CEO of Knack. "We're excited to introduce these new colors in our Series 2 Collection, which is already a favorite among Knackpackers." The Teal Green color is a cool and calming shade that evokes a sense of tranquility while the Lilac Haze color is a soft and romantic shade that adds a touch of elegance to both work and casual outfits. Both colors are versatile and can be paired with a variety of attire, making them the perfect choice for any professional who wants to look stylish and put-together. To create the new colors, Knack selected a number of potential color options for spring and narrowed down to these two after interviews and surveys with over 300 current and potential Knack owners. The Series 2 backpack collection is designed with the modern professional in mind and features Knack's best-in-class organization for everyday carry combined with its unique, patent-pending, hidden expandable suitcase compartment for up to three days of travel. The new Series 2 Teal Green and Lilac Haze colors are now available exclusively on Knack's website www.knackbags.com for $265. About Knack Inc.: Launched by a seasoned team from Tumi, Coach and eBags, Knack is a privately held, direct-to-consumer company offering patent-pending, expandable backpacks and accessories that easily take modern professionals from work to travel and back again with just one bag. With a focus on versatility, style, and function, Knack's One Bag Life mission provides the ability to do less carrying and more experiencing every day. For more about Knack, and to experience One Bag Life, visit www.knackbags.com. Contact Information: Jamie Orr Content Director jamie@knackbags.com 401-404-4003 Related Files FrontLilacHaze.jpg Teal Green Front.jpg Original Source: Knack Launches Spring Backpack Collection in Trending Teal Green and Lilac Haze
